reviews.review_msg: The lectures can be a bit disorganized in topics, but she's really approachable when you need help/clarification. She also went over almost every single midterm question with us to make sure we all understood it, though class size was small. Assignments sometimes long but they're good practice. The exams were very straightforward.

Textbook for this class is extremely relevant. Lots of Maple in this class. Proofs are a bit shaky in lecture, and sometimes has a hard time explaining stuff. Gives hints on which homework questions will be marked. Long lectures, long assignments, not difficult.
